Rossumøya¶

mod

`biosim.rossumoya provides the user the annual cycle on Rossumøya.

This file can also be imported as a module and contains the following classes:

  • MigrationProbabilityCalculator - calculates the probabilites for an animal to migrate.

  • Rossumoya - class where the user creates the island map and initial population. This is also where the different methods for the annual cycle are run.

Note

  • This script requires that textwrap and numpy are installed within the Python environment you are running this script in.

class biosim.rossumoya.MigrationProbabilityCalculator(loc, island_map, species)[source]¶

Class used to calculate probabilities for migration.

Constructor that initiate MigrationProbabilityCalculator. :param loc: Coordinates for the current position :type: tuple :param island_map: Dictionary with all cells and their locations :type: dict :param: species: Herbivore or Carnivore :type: str

property probabilities¶

Calculates probability for an animal to move from one cell to another using the propensities. :return: self.locations, probabilities: current location and the

probabilities to move from that location.

Type

tuple, list

property propensity_carn¶

Calculate the propensities of the four cells for Carnivores. :return: propensities: List with the four neighbouring cells

corresponding propensities.

Type

list

property propensity_herb¶

Calculate the propensities of the four cells for Herbivores. :return: propensities: List with the four neighbouring cells

corresponding propensities.

Type

list

class biosim.rossumoya.Rossumoya(island_map=None, ini_pop=None)[source]¶

Island class in simulation BioSim.

Constructor that initiate Rossumoya class instance. :param island_map: Multiline string indicating geography of the island. :type: str :param ini_pop: List of dictionaries indicating

initial population and location.

Type

list

add_population(population)[source]¶

Add population to the island. :param population: List of dictionaries specifying

population and locations.

Type

list

static check_map_input(island_map)[source]¶

Raises ValueError if input map is not compatible and does not follow restrictions for the geography of the island. Returns True otherwise. :param island_map: Multiline string indicating the geography

of the island.

Type

str

Returns

True

Type

bool

choose_cell(loc, species)[source]¶

Calculate propensities and returns coordinates of chosen cell to migrate to. :param: loc: Location coordinates before migration. :type: tuple :param: species: Herbivore or Carnivore :type: str :return: choice: Chosen cell coordinates to migrate to. :type: tuple

death()[source]¶

Animals are removed if prob_death returns 1.

static make_geography_coordinates(input_map)[source]¶

Makes a dictionary with coordinates as keys and Cell subclass instances (Savannah, Jungle, Desert, MountainAndOcean) as values, initiated with default parameters. :return: geography_map :type: dict

migration()[source]¶

Finds witch animals wants to migrate, and calls _migrate method.

procreation()[source]¶

If an animal gives birth, a new animal of the same species with age zero and weight drawn from draw_birth_weight is added to the same cell.

single_year()[source]¶

Run one single simulation.
